org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer.Translator

  • public class Translator
extends java.lang.Object
    AWT Viewer's localization class, backed up by java.util.ResourceBundle. Originally contributed by: Stanislav.Gorkhover@jCatalog.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Translator()
      Default constructor, default Locale is used.
      Translator(java.util.Locale locale)
      Constructor for a given Locale.
